website_summaries.verdict: An eye-catching bread box that succeeds in seamlessly combining style and functionality.
pros: Unique vintage design adds personality to any counter
Air circulation keeps moisture at a minimum, preventing mold and extending shelf life
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Not everyone is a fan of the top-hinged lid, which can make quick access tricky

customer_reviews.title: Big as a breadbox...only bigger
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Needed a place to hide the bread and bagels from our carb-addicted cat. It's much bigger than expected. The lid is raised so you can fit a full bag of bagels, a new loaf of bread and there is still room for a small bag of donuts. Love the retro look and the color is a bright red.
customer_reviews.author: Deb P

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Many of the negative reviews were centered around the cheapness of the construction. People, it's a bread box, not a tool box. The materials used are plenty sturdy enough to hold bread. It holds a loaf of store bought bread as well as a 1 1/2 lb. homemade loaf. Keeps bread fresh too.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: BIG as a BREAD box
customer_reviews.text: I bought the IVORY one. Love the look. Plenty big! Not a single dent. I was worried after other Reviews but, I knew AMAZON would make it right. I can't talk about freshness as I just got it today. Sitting next to our four slot toaster/bagel poach egg maker. Purchased through AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma C C

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It's huge!
customer_reviews.text: Just got in bread box in! I absolutely love it! I knew it was going to be huge! Not this big lol. Took a pic of it in front of my microwave for comparison purposes. The package it came in was pretty destroyed but the manufacture packing was pretty good and it had no dents or scratches. Not sure where it's going to fit in my kitchen but I'll find somewhere lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gellis

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love seeing it on my counter, and it works very well at keeping baked goods fresh and soft. Dropping a star, because it arrived with some light scuff damage on the front. It came in a box that was in another box, so no chance of the damage from shipping seemed possible. Another reviewer mentioned this, so I don't think it's a coincidence.
customer_reviews.author: Rezendes

customer_reviews.title: Great retro look
customer_reviews.text: I love the retro look of this bread box. We needed something to keep bread, bagels, etc. away from our counter-surfer cat. I was afraid that this would only be big enough to hold a loaf of bread, but it is large enough to add a package of bagels or a couple of boxes of protein bars. The lid is easy to open (one-handed works fine), and the hinges seem sturdy. The red color looks great in our kitchen, and it keeps everything clean and safe.
customer_reviews.author: PattiM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, Well packaged, large size for family use!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and without dents, nicks or other issues. Lightweight and lid is not hinged in order to prevent falling back and getting dented. This bread pan is metal but not stainless steel so will rust! Colour is brilliant red, size is good as I’m a baker and air holes are helpful to prevent condensation buildup. I placed a cloth napkin on the bottom of the pan before putting my freshly baked cooled loaves in partly opened ziplock bags, as a further deterrent to moisture buildup. I will update the review if the bread pan becomes rusted inside, in spite of the precautions to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: NCFoodie

customer_reviews.title: no dents or dings and I love it. I would best describe the red as ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly, no dents or dings and I love it. I would best describe the red as fire engine red for those trying to match reds. It's a good size while not taking up a lot of counter space. I got a bread loaf, package of hot dog buns, package of cookies and what was left of a bag of chips. So glad I finally made up my mind to order it.
customer_reviews.author: Tigressbythetail

customer_reviews.title: Large and attractive but tends to move when lid opened
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and appearance of this bread box. Within a few months however the front handle came off and the screws in the back started coming out. I was able to reattach them. The only real negative aspect of this box is that when I open the lid the whole box moves on the counter with the lid hitting the wall or the counter. In other words it tends to slide rather than staying put when I open the lid. This is rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome item!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new breadbox! I love the retro look of it, it’s the perfect size and it fits an entire loaf of bread and bagels At the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I bought one of these bread boxes for my parents ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these bread boxes for my parents, who live in arid Eastern Washington, and one for me. I live in Seattle. This box has extended the life of baked goods in both climates. My father bakes his own bread. So, it is without preservatives. This box has kept his bread fresh for a few weeks. I have noticed that I can keep the bread in the box as opposed to the refrigerator and it stays fresh and does not get moldy. I can keep bread in the box for around three weeks and not worry about mold.
customer_reviews.author: angelakatydid

customer_reviews.title: Large bread box and looks great
customer_reviews.text: We've been searching for a bread box for a while, but I didn't like the "typical" look. Love the retro look and the color options (we went with red) and at a great price. Exactly as pictured. Even though it gave the dimensions, it turned out to be much larger than I had expected - so be sure you have the counter space. Holds a loaf of bread, some rolls and more. We've had it for a few months now and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bread box
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our kitchen! I love that this bread box fits more than you'd expect - it easily fits 2 whole loaves of bread & can still fit a bag of hamburger buns, too. Combine it's large capacity with the attractiveness of the bread box & it's a winner all around. We've had ours for 4 years now & it's withstood 3 moves, (one across country) & it's still as sturdy as ever. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Banani

customer_reviews.title: Huge dent when arrived
customer_reviews.text: Big dent in top!, box was packaged well and not damaged, so bread box must have gort damaged before putting in box, very disappointing, will be returning
customer_reviews.author: AKgirl67

customer_reviews.title: Cute addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Awesome breadbox!! I love the vintage look of this breadbox. It fits in great with my industrial styled kitchen. It is a good size and fits quite a bit in it, however you need to remember that items are stacked on top of each other which can obviously cause issues if you are using it for actual bread. I use it for bread but also chips. I have yet to have a squished loaf.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for and holds a lot of bread
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for mother’s day as we saw the same model at a local store for twice as much. It’s a really good size, doesnt take up too much space on the counter, but fits a lot of bread. Like, a giant loaf of italian bread and some buns and other breads all at once. Very satisfied. Super bright red, lettering is crisp. We’re really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Bre Puetz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bread Box
customer_reviews.text: Very large, which is great! I had to shift things around on my counter top to find room! I have just a couple of bread items to put in now, but looking forward to baking some more to fill it up! Box arrived with in another box, a layer of bubble wrap around it, and some styrofoam also. Two tabs of tape held the lid closed. Ventilation holes are on the back of the box only, hope it's enough.... Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for me, I only buy bread from the bakery. So having no preservatives it's tricky to keep fresh, This allows the bread to breathe just right. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: John Ron-Je'

customer_reviews.title: Hiding the bread
customer_reviews.text: I always seem to have parts of a few loaves of bread on the counter, along with crackers and cookies. Ordered this beautiful RED bread box and it's large enough for all the extras - making my counter look much better. Now to remember to look in it for those snacks and/or bread. I like it though!!
customer_reviews.author: BBK

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BREAD BOX
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!!! The box is metal and very large. It would hold at least a couple of loaves of the bread that we purchase (Nature's Own 20 oz loaves) plus some bagels and English Muffins. I personally use it for our bread and to hide the Pop Tarts from sight. ;) That said, it isn't overwhelming in size either and the color is PERFECT!! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: labbie1

customer_reviews.title: Nice breadbox
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this breadbox! It is a little bigger than I anticipated for the price, it holds a loaf of bread, a dozen hamburger sized buns and a 20ct pack of tortilla shells with ease. The red is a true red and not orangy at all. Works well with my kitchen decor.
customer_reviews.author: aCoffeeJunky

customer_reviews.title: Can not control mold
customer_reviews.text: My bread still gets moldy. Bagels and anything in there still will get moldy. Not sure it helps with anything
customer_reviews.author: school-mam

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and size! Sturdy material.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and big. Holds several loaves of bread and looks beautiful on my black granite. Keeps bread fresh a long time. Cleaned up my clutter. I. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love my new bread box!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bread box and its vibrant red color. It has been 2 days since I received it and looks pretty cool in my kitchen. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it came slightly dented on the very top of the box. Dent is not visible from the front so I decided to keep it as I did not want to go through the hassle of returning and re-purchasing. It is very spacious and can easily hold 2 loafs of sliced bread plus more.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Chari

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I thought it would be.Holds bread,snacks,etc.When I put my bread in the cabinets,it molds fast.I have not had 1 loaf of bread that has molded since I started using this.Well worth every penny ! It also would make a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Buy this breadbox-you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Nice red color, large box, hinges work well, metal stronger than others. Air vents in back to prevent moisture buildup. Very pleased with bread box-also cute with “BREAD” written across front. My mother loved it!
customer_reviews.author: bette williams

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over six months now; it’s the best bread box I’ve ever owned. Sturdy, big enough to hold a lot without taking up yards of counter space and keeps my breads super fresh. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Fine beadbox
customer_reviews.text: For our needs this is perfect. Having a flat top is a bonus - handy for a temporary shelf. Just the right size, too. Holds two small loaves tip-to-tip. And looks good, rather retro. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Zork

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Excellent delivery - soooo fast. Not a scratch on it. It's cute as it can be and holds several whole loaves with room for more. Love the vibrant red color, the lower case lettered ....b r e a d... on front, and it keeps my counters clean - cause I never have put my bread in the fridge and always have several open on the counters. Great product and a good fair price. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Nikiwiki

customer_reviews.title: matches my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love the retro look (what my mom calls it) and the red matches the accent color of my kitchen. I made 2 loaves of bread on Sunday, and kept them in this bread box after I cut into one of the loaves. I was nervous about drying out/crusty part of the cut bread, but this bread box kept it beautifully. My husband just ate on of the last pieces of the 2nd loaf today (Friday), and it's still nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Abby K

customer_reviews.title: Didn't quite think thru this order
customer_reviews.text: Box is nice but wish it was a front opening box. Would return & replace it but don't have a box big enough to send it back. If you put your bread on top of your fridge it's not practical. Other than that... it's nice quality and holds a lot of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: NOSTALGIC MEMORY BREAD BOX
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bread box for the nostalgic memories it stirred. I keep it on my kitchen counter and store my pita bread, small loaf and a few other bread items. Very roomy, very colorful and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Queen

customer_reviews.title: it's adorable and does it's job
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! Despite the reviews, I didn't think it would be this big. That being said, it's adorable and does it's job!
customer_reviews.author: sami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you’re looking for a large bread box.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread box. I shopped and compared so many bread boxes before making the decision to purchase this one. I’m happy to say that I made the right choice. It’s on the larger side, which is what I wanted. It easily holds a loaf of bread and two packages of hot dog or hamburger buns. I love the bright red color, and it seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER WALKER

customer_reviews.title: My cat will stop ripping my bread bags yey!
customer_reviews.text: Love this plenty of room for more than just one loaf of bread ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: This large  tin can be used for storage other than bread.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought the box to store my tea! Very spacious and I can fit a lot of tea in it, which means whoever wants to store bread in it, will find that there is a good amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Def happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: It looks so cute on my counter. Its a bit big but it serves its purpose in concealing bread and other items on the counter. It keeps bread and cookie type items fresh and germ free! I have received compliments. Def happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: nice retro addition to a modern kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very gorgeous color. It adds a nice retro looks to my new modem kitchen. Just had it for a few days and our friends want one too. Fit 2 big loaf of bread no problem. It's made from stainless steel so is very light. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Minh Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great and trendy
customer_reviews.text: This thing can hold a lot of bread!!!!! It's also super trendy, and steps your kitchen up a notch. It's deep enough to hold a super large bag of chips, if that helps. It also feels sturdy...like it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Deon

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Large Bread Box!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bread box!!! If I didn't know better, I'd think it was from the 50's. Very sturdy!!!! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nighthunter

customer_reviews.title: Love this box!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect!!! Arrived on time in perfect condition. Currently holding a loaf of bread, package of bagels and 2 packages of tortillas with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made bread box! I bought this as a gift for one of my sister's and it looks so cheerful in her kitchen! It is very roomy inside too! I will probably purchase one for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Cute and big. I have to leave it open in the summer, or the bread molds overnight. But, that's from living in the humid Midwest and then closing that humidity in, not because of the box itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bread Box
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bread box. The style is super cute! It is built well and appears to be sturdy. Easily holds a loaf of bread, english muffins and rolls with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Haiderer

customer_reviews.title: Large enough and decorative
customer_reviews.text: The box is big enough to fit a few things in. The openings help keep bread fresher. It compliments my kitchen counter. I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Did not keep bread fresh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trying to bring some order to my kitchen. Wish I could return it but too late. I had one bag of bread that went bad in the box and all the bread in the box got the odor and flavor of the bad bread. i guess i will donate to goodwill or something since its to late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I wanted something big enough to store all my bread in, but not something too big that would take up an enormous amount of space and this worked out perfect. I can fit a whole loaf of bread and a pack of hamburger and hot dog buns in it without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaS9001

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A lot larger than I thought. But it looks great. Nice color
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice, sturdy breadbox
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, sturdy breadbox, and it's retro look is really fine, holds store bought loaves just fine with room to spare for that partial loaf too or a few dinner rolls/etc
customer_reviews.author: TomCoyote

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Spacious, and Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: A very nice and spacious bin. The red is vibrant. I would have gave it a five star rating if the bin had a hinge. The top flips opens and hits my back counter. Hopefully, it doesn't dent it up. I'll have to be more careful. Also, a word of advice, if you do get this bin, keep your greasy fingers away from bin and use the little handle. It smudges very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gilmo676

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Bread Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Keeps bread fresh for several days. Great size. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: CAROLE18

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute gives my husband a place ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute,cute,cute gives my husband a place to hide all his treats he shouldnt be eating!
customer_reviews.author: badger

customer_reviews.title: Great product for consolidation
customer_reviews.text: Product was a bit larger than expected with good fit and finish. Nice counter addition keeping counter clear by consolidating items within arms reach.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Judkins Adamore

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on our counter
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable. Very retro. Opens and closes easily. Bright true red color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Retro and cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and keep the bread fresh. We just had a heat wave and nothing got moldy with no AC in the kitchen. It is bigger than I thought it would be by that is my fault for not looking at the size specs. Retro and cute but takes up a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return it because it was larger than I expect for a loaf of bread. However, I realized it is multi-purpose. I store my bread, my pasta and my snacks in there. I love it. The quality of the product is great and it's fun to look at the love red box in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and functional. Bread lasts much longer in this!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bread box is a great size, I can fit a few loaves of bread, tortillas, and more! Love the color and style, too!
customer_reviews.author: Enggirl_99

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This looks as it does in the picture ~Its durable & pretty to look at..Is big enough to keep chips in as well as bread~Looks nice on countertop...Love the red as well
customer_reviews.author: Joy4Joy

customer_reviews.title: awesome and cute
customer_reviews.text: Just started making homemade bread and this guy keeps it from drying out.. he's cute. I can fit two loaves and some biscuits in him. Love him
customer_reviews.author: Trish Tha Dish

customer_reviews.title: I did not open the box to see it in person but they said they loved it and that it was a very nice quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift I ordered for a family member. I did not open the box to see it in person but they said they loved it and that it was a very nice quality breadbox. My daughter was there when it was opened and said that the recipient loved it and that it was a nice shade of red and a nice size.
customer_reviews.author: phatarmywife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect red bread box
customer_reviews.text: Awesome large size, I LOVE the look. It’s so my style. Seriously cute box. It is large so it can take up some space on your counter.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: Love the red love the Retro it's fun for the kitchen useful perfect size
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bread box
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my bread box I love the vivid red and the size is perfect for a loaf of bread as well as a couple of other things.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Love this bread box. My brad stays fresh a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dennise

customer_reviews.title: Both thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Such a great look....the king in the pantry....keeps all my bread secure and fresh
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Tito Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Big and Red !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this box. Been researching and finally got this. Room for load of 2 muffins and some extras. Living it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PIE

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased with this purchase! If you are looking for a retro bread box; this is the one to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Pickens Miller

customer_reviews.title: No more bread cluttering coumtertop
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as pictured. No dents or scratches. Now I have a place to put all the bread & rolls in...off the counter & out of sight
customer_reviews.author: Hunnie

customer_reviews.title: Love having a bread box again
customer_reviews.text: Love having a bread box again. Beats a microwave for keeping bread fresh, and now that I'm baking more bread at home, it has come in handy. About prefect size for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael GrantTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bread box! It's bright red, good quality, holds quite a bit, and adds fun character to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T

customer_reviews.title: A little big but is great.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's on the bigger side but I can fit 2 loaves of bread and some bagels in there at one time. I love the color and am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren J Klein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bread box
customer_reviews.text: Love this bread box. It fits 2 loaves of bread and a bunch of tortillas. I noticed the bread stays fresher longer.
customer_reviews.author: Telgip

customer_reviews.title: Vintage look, modern feel
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and pleased at how roomy the bread box is. I bought one of the kind of chubby loaves of bread and it fits just fine. Love the color and it's vintage look.
customer_reviews.author: bevels

customer_reviews.title: If you love red, you have got to have it.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I wanted. It is perfect in the space on my counter and goes perfect with the red kitchen I have.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Newman

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. Big enough to not only hold bread, but leftover chip bags, etc. A nice bright red! I wanted to attach a pic, but can't figure out how!
customer_reviews.author: Starlett*

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great bread box! Fits 2 loaves of bread, a bag of donuts and a bag of hotdog buns! Looks great in the kitchen. Easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: wpowell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice retro looking bread box, roomy enough for a loaf of bread & package of english muffins!
customer_reviews.author: Ronault D. Trowbridge

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Works for me...nice easy container for the bread in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Gloria R.

customer_reviews.title: Retro breadbox to go in our Retro RV!
customer_reviews.text: It's an adorable red box with white letters. Plenty of space for bread or other baked goods. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: PDN

customer_reviews.title: Nice bread bin but arrived in packaging with small dent ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bread bin but arrived in packaging with small dent on it. Not enough to go through the hassle of sending it back, but slightly disappointed. It sill looks great on the side in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hart

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. It's a nice size box. You can fit a couple store bought sized loafs as well as some snacks.
customer_reviews.author: KmacKK27

customer_reviews.title: Nice box, well made
customer_reviews.text: I love this box, keeps everything fresh and off the counter
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and useful. Can hold three loaves of bread
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and useful. Can hold three loaves of bread. Also put hamburger buns and other cracker or bread products in it to neaten-up the counter space. The red color really pops on my black granite. Well made. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris U.

customer_reviews.title: Received with slight damage but decided to keep item!
customer_reviews.text: Received slightly damaged but decided it was to much to return because of severe health issues & were not able to return! I was unable to drive , had open heart surgery- triple bypass! So We kept it!! Thank you Alice Hebert
customer_reviews.author: Alice T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: large enough for all the stuff that was making a mess on my counter!
customer_reviews.author: wvgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not functional
customer_reviews.text: The entire box moves every time it opens and scrapes across my granite making a "nails on the chalkboard" sound. I thought it would be a decorative solution for the kids' snacks, but it is just going to be decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose i needed but when I got it it was pretty banged up and dented. Wasnt to happy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great size, love the red.
customer_reviews.text: This box is just the right size for my kitchen, holds two loaves of bread and some buns at the same time. It's very cute and I like the way if opens from the top. Kind of wish "bread" was captilized. Otherwise , perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy having a place to store my bread. I love the look and that it is red.
customer_reviews.author: Arla

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and perfect
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with my purchase. Gina and large capacity it goes great with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: yellowlablover

customer_reviews.title: It can easily dent
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s going to have dents if you mishandle it but otherwise if because and presentable
customer_reviews.author: Albergos

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Box
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing on my kitchen counter! I love the sleek styling. Well-made, great color. I put cat food cans in it--instead of bread. Has a great retro feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Breadbox
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. The red is so pure and it really brightens up a cabin in the woods! Really retro, really functional, tons of room. Tons!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie in Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good it fit a lot of kinds of breads inside
customer_reviews.author: Laryssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this breadbox! I love the style and it hold so much! Sturdy and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality -- very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Good quality -- very sturdy. Holds loaf of bread plus smal bag of chips. Bright red as in "coca cola "red. Like the fact the top is flat so that I can put something on top if necessary. I am in small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Addie O

customer_reviews.title: Great breadbox
customer_reviews.text: Love this breadbox; pretty shade of red and big enough to hold everything I need... I keep looking at it and saying how happy I am that I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: David Howell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition. Cute. Keeps bread moist. 5/5 Stars! ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bankston

customer_reviews.title: painted nice, I only wish it had something so the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really big, can fit a lot of bread. Well made, painted nice, I only wish it had something so the lid wouldn't go all the way back, the way some toolboxes have.
customer_reviews.author: Nnyraptor

product_meta.title: Juvale Bread Box for Kitchen Counter - Stainless Steel Large Bread Bin Storage Container Holder for Loaves, Pastries & More - Retro Vintage Design, Red, 16.75 x 9 x 6.5 inches
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR BREAD FRESH FOR LONGER: Extends the shelf life of your breads and pastries while the lid shuts firmly preventing flies and environmental germs from reaching.
ADDITIONAL FEATURES: Designed with small holes that allows air circulation to further keep bread fresh.

ORGANIZED KITCHEN COUNTER: Getting tired of seeing bread and buns out on your kitchen counter? Constructed with durable stainless steel, this bread box provides ample storage space and making it essential for any kitchen or home.
EASY TO CLEAN: Simply hand wash or use warm water to clean and use dry cloth to wipe.
LARGE CAPACITY: Bread box measures 16.75 x 9 x 6.5 inches, easily fits 2 loaves of bread and still with plenty of extra space for bagels and small pastries.
